str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To endure, bear with, have patience with, suffer, admit, persist.
Senseless, foolish, inconsiderate. Properly, mindless, i.e. Stupid, ignorant, egotistic, rash, or unbelieving.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Intelligent, prudent, sensible, wise. From phren; thoughtful, i.e. Sagacious or discreet; in a bad sense conceited.
